article:
Jude Bellingham

Jude Victor William Bellingham is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Spanish club Real Madrid and the England national team. He is widely regarded as one of the most promising young players in the world, known for his exceptional skill, vision, and leadership on the pitch.

#Early life and education

Bellingham was born on June 29, 2003, in Stourbridge, West Midlands, England. He began playing football at a young age, joining the local club Cadbury Athletic before moving to Birmingham City's academy at the age of seven. Bellingham's father, Mark, was a police officer and a semi-professional footballer, who played a significant role in encouraging his son's early interest in the sport. Bellingham attended Priory School in Birmingham and later enrolled in a football academy, where he completed his secondary education.

#Club career

##Birmingham City

Bellingham joined Birmingham City's academy at the age of seven and quickly established himself as one of the club's most promising young players. He made his professional debut for the club on August 6, 2019, at the age of 16, becoming the youngest player to ever play for Birmingham City in a first-team match. Bellingham went on to make 44 appearances for the club, scoring four goals and providing three assists, before leaving for Borussia Dortmund in 2020.

##Borussia Dortmund

###2020–2021: Transfer and record-breaking achievements

In July 2020, Bellingham joined Borussia Dortmund on a five-year contract, reportedly worth £22 million. At 17, he became the youngest English player to ever play in the Bundesliga. Bellingham made his debut for the club on September 14, 2020, and quickly established himself as a regular starter, playing in 46 matches and scoring four goals in his first season. During the 2020-21 season, Bellingham became the youngest English player to ever score in the Champions League, breaking the record previously held by Jack Wilshere.

###2021–2023: Bundesliga Player of the Season and league runner-up

In the 2021-22 season, Bellingham established himself as one of the top midfielders in the Bundesliga, scoring six goals and providing 13 assists in 32 matches. He was named Bundesliga Player of the Season and helped Dortmund finish as league runners-up. Bellingham continued to impress in the 2022-23 season, scoring eight goals and providing 11 assists in 31 matches, before leaving for Real Madrid in the summer of 2023.

##Real Madrid

###2023–24: Debut season and goalscoring records

In June 2023, Bellingham joined Real Madrid on a six-year contract, reportedly worth £115 million. He made his debut for the club on August 12, 2023, and quickly established himself as a regular starter, playing in 25 matches and scoring 10 goals in his first season. During the 2023-24 season, Bellingham became the youngest English player to ever score a hat-trick in La Liga, breaking the record previously held by Marcus Rashford.

###2024–25: Second season and European Super Cup

In the 2024-25 season, Bellingham continued to impress, scoring 12 goals and providing eight assists in 20 matches. He helped Real Madrid win the European Super Cup, scoring the winning goal in the final against Manchester City.

#International career

##Youth career

Bellingham represented England at various youth levels, playing for the under-15, under-16, and under-17 teams. He captained the under-17 team and helped England win the 2019 UEFA European Under-17 Championship.

##Senior career

Bellingham made his debut for the England senior team on November 12, 2020, at the age of 17, becoming the third-youngest player to ever play for England. He scored his first goal for the team on June 15, 2021, in a 4-0 win over Andorra.

##UEFA Euro 2024

Bellingham played a key role in England's UEFA Euro 2024 campaign, scoring two goals and providing three assists in five matches. He helped England reach the semi-finals, where they lost to France.

#Style of play

Bellingham is a versatile midfielder who can play in various positions, including central midfield, attacking midfield, and wide midfield. He is known for his exceptional skill, vision, and leadership on the pitch. Bellingham is a box-to-box midfielder who is comfortable playing in a deep-lying role or as a more advanced playmaker. He is also an excellent set-piece taker and has a strong shot from distance.

#Outside football

Bellingham is an avid music lover and has expressed his interest in attending music festivals and concerts in his free time. He is also a fan of video games and has been known to stream his gaming sessions on social media.
